cbinstall.name: Multi Author Tab
cbinstall.author: Alain Rivest
cbinstall.description: *** Don't forget to publish the plugin in CB Plugin Manager. To change the tab settings, go in CB Tab Mangement. *** Multi Author Tab Version : Provides multiple tabs that shows all articles written by the user for a specific section or category. Multi Author Tab support up to 20 tabs. Based on the core plugin cb.authortab from beat@joomlapolis.com

param.name: @spacer
param.default: Multi Author Tab 1.7 (2012-02-04)
param.label: Version

param.name: @spacer
param.default: Go to Tab Management to set the parameters for each tab.
param.label: Instruction

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Text
param.default: To display some text at the top of the list of articles, fill the Description field on the left.
param.description: The description will be displayed on this tab on the profile page (even if it says it won't).

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Note
param.default: The Section ID and Section name parameters will be ignored in Joomla 1.6 and over. Sections no longer exists in Joomla, there's only categories.

param.name: MatContentType
param.label: Content Type
param.description: Show articles from Joomla or from K2.

param.name: MatSectionId
param.label: Section ID
param.description: List of section ID, separated by comma, leave empty for all sections. (Joomla 1.5 only)

param.name: MatCatId
param.label: Category ID
param.description: List of category ID, separated by comma, leave empty for all categories.

param.name: MatShowSectionId
param.label: Show Section ID
param.description: Specify Yes to display a column for the section ID of each articles. (Joomla 1.5 only)

param.name: MatShowSectionName
param.label: Show Section name
param.description: Specify Yes to display a column for the section name of each articles. (Joomla 1.5 only)

param.name: MatShowCatId
param.label: Show Category ID
param.description: Specify Yes to display a column for the category ID of each articles.

param.name: MatShowCatName
param.label: Show Category name
param.description: Specify Yes to display a column for the category name of each articles.

param.name: MatShowHits
param.label: Show Hits
param.description: Specify Yes to display the number of hits for an article.

param.name: MatShowRating
param.label: Show Rating
param.description: Specify Yes to display the number of vote for an article.

param.name: MatShowEmptyTab
param.label: Show Empty Tab
param.description: Specify Yes to display the tab even if it has no articles. By default an empty tab is hidden.

param.name: MatShowEdit
param.label: Show Edit Icon
param.description: Specify Yes to display the edit icon beside the title when viewing your profile.

param.name: MatDate
param.label: Date
param.description: Choose what date to display.

param.name: MatAuthorAlias
param.label: Search by author alias
param.description: Specify Yes to search articles that match the author alias instead of the user name.

param.name: MatMyArticles
param.label: Show user's articles only
param.description: Specify No to display articles from all users (matching other criteria). By default only the user's articles are displayed.

param.name: MatMaxArticle
param.label: Maximum articles
param.description: The maximum number of articles to display. Leave empty to list all articles, or enter a number to display only the more recent articles.

param.name: MatNbPerPage
param.label: Number of articles per page
param.description: The number of articles to display per page. Leave empty to not use pagination.

param.name: MatOrder
param.label: Sort order
param.description: Choose on what column to sort the list.

param.name: MatOrderDir
param.label: Sort direction
param.description: Sort the list in ascendent or descendent order.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Text
param.default: To display some text at the top of the list of articles, fill the Description field on the left.
param.description: The description will be displayed on this tab on the profile page (even if it says it won't).

param.description: List of category ID, separated by comma, leave empty for all categories.

param.name: MatShowSectionId
param.label: Show Section ID
param.description: Specify Yes to display a column for the section ID of each articles. (Joomla 1.5 only)

param.name: MatShowSectionName
param.label: Show Section name
param.description: Specify Yes to display a column for the section name of each articles. (Joomla 1.5 only)

param.name: MatShowCatId
param.label: Show Category ID
param.description: Specify Yes to display a column for the category ID of each articles.

param.name: MatShowCatName
param.label: Show Category name
param.description: Specify Yes to display a column for the category name of each articles.

param.name: MatShowHits
param.label: Show Hits
param.description: Specify Yes to display the number of hits for an article.

param.name: MatShowRating
param.label: Show Rating
param.description: Specify Yes to display the number of vote for an article.

param.name: MatShowEmptyTab
param.label: Show Empty Tab
param.description: Specify Yes to display the tab even if it has no articles. By default an empty tab is hidden.

param.name: MatShowEdit
param.label: Show Edit Icon
param.description: Specify Yes to display the edit icon beside the title when viewing your profile.

param.name: MatDate
param.label: Date
param.description: Choose what date to display.

param.name: MatAuthorAlias
param.label: Search by author alias
param.description: Specify Yes to search articles that match the author alias instead of the user name.

param.name: MatMyArticles
param.label: Show user's articles only
param.description: Specify No to display articles from all users (matching other criteria). By default only the user's articles are displayed.

param.name: MatMaxArticle
param.label: Maximum articles
param.description: The maximum number of articles to display. Leave empty to list all articles, or enter a number to display only the more recent articles.

param.name: MatNbPerPage
param.label: Number of articles per page
param.description: The number of articles to display per page. Leave empty to not use pagination.

param.name: MatOrder
param.label: Sort order
param.description: Choose on what column to sort the list.

param.name: MatOrderDir
param.label: Sort direction
param.description: Sort the list in ascendent or descendent order.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Text
param.default: To display some text at the top of the list of articles, fill the Description field on the left.
param.description: The description will be displayed on this tab on the profile page (even if it says it won't).

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Note
param.default: The Section ID and Section name parameters will be ignored in Joomla 1.6 and over. Sections no longer exists in Joomla, there's only categories.

param.label: Search by author alias
param.description: Specify Yes to search articles that match the author alias instead of the user name.

param.name: MatMyArticles
param.label: Show user's articles only
param.description: Specify No to display articles from all users (matching other criteria). By default only the user's articles are displayed.

param.name: MatMaxArticle
param.label: Maximum articles
param.description: The maximum number of articles to display. Leave empty to list all articles, or enter a number to display only the more recent articles.

param.name: MatNbPerPage
param.label: Number of articles per page
param.description: The number of articles to display per page. Leave empty to not use pagination.

param.name: MatOrder
param.label: Sort order
param.description: Choose on what column to sort the list.

param.name: MatOrderDir
param.label: Sort direction
param.description: Sort the list in ascendent or descendent order.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Text
param.default: To display some text at the top of the list of articles, fill the Description field on the left.
param.description: The description will be displayed on this tab on the profile page (even if it says it won't).

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Note
param.default: The Section ID and Section name parameters will be ignored in Joomla 1.6 and over. Sections no longer exists in Joomla, there's only categories.

param.name: MatContentType
param.label: Content Type
param.description: Show articles from Joomla or from K2.

param.name: MatSectionId
param.label: Section ID
param.description: List of section ID, separated by comma, leave empty for all sections. (Joomla 1.5 only)

param.name: MatCatId
param.label: Category ID
param.description: List of category ID, separated by comma, leave empty for all categories.

param.name: MatShowSectionId
param.label: Show Section ID
param.description: Specify Yes to display a column for the section ID of each articles. (Joomla 1.5 only)

param.name: MatShowSectionName
param.label: Show Section name
param.description: Specify Yes to display a column for the section name of each articles. (Joomla 1.5 only)

param.name: MatShowCatId
param.label: Show Category ID
param.description: Specify Yes to display a column for the category ID of each articles.

param.name: MatShowCatName
param.label: Show Category name
param.description: Specify Yes to display a column for the category name of each articles.

param.name: MatShowHits
param.label: Show Hits
param.description: Specify Yes to display the number of hits for an article.

param.name: MatShowRating
param.label: Show Rating
param.description: Specify Yes to display the number of vote for an article.

param.name: MatShowEmptyTab
param.label: Show Empty Tab
param.description: Specify Yes to display the tab even if it has no articles. By default an empty tab is hidden.

param.name: MatShowEdit
param.label: Show Edit Icon
param.description: Specify Yes to display the edit icon beside the title when viewing your profile.

param.name: MatDate
param.label: Date
param.description: Choose what date to display.

param.name: MatAuthorAlias
param.label: Search by author alias
param.description: Specify Yes to search articles that match the author alias instead of the user name.

param.name: MatMyArticles
param.label: Show user's articles only
param.description: Specify No to display articles from all users (matching other criteria). By default only the user's articles are displayed.

param.name: MatMaxArticle
param.label: Maximum articles
param.description: The maximum number of articles to display. Leave empty to list all articles, or enter a number to display only the more recent articles.

param.name: MatNbPerPage
param.label: Number of articles per page
param.description: The number of articles to display per page. Leave empty to not use pagination.

param.name: MatOrder
param.label: Sort order
param.description: Choose on what column to sort the list.

param.name: MatOrderDir
param.label: Sort direction
param.description: Sort the list in ascendent or descendent order.

queries.query: UPDATE `#__comprofiler_tabs` SET enabled = 0 WHERE pluginclass in ( 'getMultiAuthorTab4', 'getMultiAuthorTab5', 'getMultiAuthorTab6', 'getMultiAuthorTab7', 'getMultiAuthorTab8', 'getMultiAuthorTab9', 'getMultiAuthorTab10', 'getMultiAuthorTab11', 'getMultiAuthorTab12', 'getMultiAuthorTab13', 'getMultiAuthorTab14', 'getMultiAuthorTab15', 'getMultiAuthorTab16', 'getMultiAuthorTab17', 'getMultiAuthorTab18', 'getMultiAuthorTab19', 'getMultiAuthorTab20') AND params is NULL;
